name: Culinary Survivors
description:
An easy-to-play casual, top-down, reverse bullet-hell with a friendly pick up and play ability. Run from an ever-increasing endless horde of food trying to destroy you, the chef. Make strategic decisions in leveling up your weapons and defense to see how long you can survive. Run away from enemies while your character automatically attacks with the weapon selections that you have made and survive for as long as you can. Collect experience dropped from defeating enemies and level up allowing you to choose from a set of upgrades to build your character the way that you want.



  • Simple to play - Run from enemies and collect experience as your character automatically attacks.
  • Variety of play-styles - Choose from a variety of weapons to level up to build the offense and defense of your character how you want.
  • Set new records - Try to set high scores for each item and do better than your previous runs.
  • Every game is different - Rogue-lite elements and procedural generation ensure that every game is unique.
